title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – VW AMAROK

content.rendered:
THE RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR FOR VW AMAROK IS READY FOR ORDER NOW

The new and exciting Evolution rear replacement bar is available for order now. These new bars give your 4WD an aggressive but styled look without looking like a farm truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect your body. They include a 48mm 3000kg tow hitch, have an industry leading angle of departure and a tread for entering the rear of your vehicle. They also look great optioned in full chrome or color coded.

The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in black, or full stainless steel. It is a 3mm and 6mm all steel construction. Our rear bars are very unique will defiantly stand out amongst the crowd.

The bar comes with a 48mm square hitch tow bar receiver as standard. This ensures a great angle of departure as the tow hitch is not below the rear bar but contained within.

On request they can be optioned to be non-reverse sensor compatible by providing blanketing plugs.

*Compatible with the new V6 Amarok

Includes:

  • Rear bar in black colour coded or full stainless steel
  • Square hitch tow bar receiver rated to 3000kg
  • Non slip tread plate

RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – VW AMAROK

Tough never looked so good

excerpt.rendered:
The Rhino 4X4 Evolution Rear Bar for the VW Amarok is available for order now at Automax 4X4.

Aggressive but styled, tough never looked so good.
